channel.title: Christmas Tradeoff
channel.description: If you had the choice of giving up [i]all gifts[/i] you would receive this Christmas for the on-time release of BMS, would you do it? Tough question for me, cuz' I'm supposed to get a new computer this year...which means I could play BMS to its full potential.....

item.title: Christmas Tradeoff
item.dc:creator: TheSuperNova
item.description:
DeatHTaX:

If you had the choice of giving up all gifts you would receive this Christmas for the on-time release of BMS, would you do it? Tough question for me, cuz’ I’m supposed to get a new computer this year…which means I could play BMS to its full potential…

are you serious?? id rather have a Marshall mg dfx100 watt amplifier than a on-time release

besides, hopefuly from what i’ve heard itl be early 2010

Read full topic

item.title: Christmas Tradeoff
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
I’m just as confused as you are.
Valve didn’t make half of the games on that list, and they aren’t making Black Mesa.

Read full topic

item.title: Christmas Tradeoff
item.dc:creator: Shasta
item.description:
Nickmadkiller:

The Evolution of Valve

Half Life - 1998

Half Life - Opposing Force 1999

Team Fortress - 1999

Counter-Strike - 2000

Ricochet - 2000

Deathmatch Classic - 2001

Half Life - Blue Shift 2002

Day of Defeat - 2003

Half Life 2 - 2004

Half Life 2 : Deathmatch - 2004

Counter-Strike Condition Zero - 2004

Counter-Strike : Source - 2004

Half Life 2 : Lost Coast - 2005

Day of Defeat : Source - 2005

Half Life 2 - Episode One - 2006

Half Life Deathmatch Source - 2006

Half Life 2 - Episode Two - 2007

Portal - 2007

Left 4 Dead - 2008

Left 4 Dead 2 - 2009

So you wonder why it takes 5 years to make such a mod…is it because they kept making too many games?..well look at the results…it shows in the writing…

Is this what caused the delay…?Or was it science in the making…or was it the G-Man preventing such a wonderful mod…?We will never know…but we will know that Black Mesa is coming in 2010!Or is it?..

Black Mesa 2256 Coming Soon to Players Like You[/SIZE]

HOLY CRAP!

You forgot things like Team Fortress 2, and also it was my understanding that Opposing Force and Counter Strike weren’t actually made by Valve. Also, you say “So you wonder why it takes 5 years to make such a mod…is it because they kept making too many games?” - are you talking about Black Mesa? If you are, you don’t seem to be aware that Valve have nothing to do with making this mod. Just saying, if you’re going to do something, do it properly…

Read full topic

item.title: Christmas Tradeoff
item.dc:creator: Brother_Shrike
item.description:
The Zune’s screen is smaller than the Touch’s… that wasn’t one of my points. :hmph:

Read full topic

item.title: Christmas Tradeoff
item.dc:creator: Brother_Shrike
item.description:
I have a touch, and the touch does, admittedly, beat the Zune in being an all-around gadget (more apps, youtube, etc).

But the Zune HD is much better at being a music player - better screen (brighter, stronger, more vibrant colors) and it’s much higher powered - the interface is more fluid and more responsive. The zune pass is also just an all around amazing deal.

Read full topic

item.title: Christmas Tradeoff
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
mga:

I haven’t used a Zune but it just looks like an attempt at doing what the iPod has been doing well for years. iPods are solid products and definitely the only Apple product worth the price.

My only complaint about the iPod is the lack of format support and lack of minor features like an equalizer.

Sounds like you need an Archos! Support for every format out there, high resolution touch screen, wifi, games, equalizer, television, and durable construction! Oh, and cheaper than iPod.(yeah, sounds like an ad, but I swear by them)

Read full topic

I’m getting a 32GB iPod Touch and Madden 10. I already bought myself a 24" LCD and Modern Warfare 2 as early gifts.

Probably getting some cash, clothes and gift cards as well.

item.title: Christmas Tradeoff
item.dc:creator: nietzschesaurus
item.description:
JohnKiller118:

Yep. It’s called “being an adult.”

what a sad, destitute life you must lead. i mean, like, you don’t even exchange gifts with your friends? you have friends, right? :C i’ll send you a present.

on topic; uh, probably not. last year my christmas tree was wrapping paper cut into the shape of a pine tree and taped to my apartment wall. i have low expectations for christmas, but i still celebrate it the way richard dawkins meant for it to be celebrated.

angry sex in jello pudding.

just so we’re clear; i wouldn’t trade angry sex in jello pudding for BM: S

Read full topic
